changeSet.author: mcovarr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO WORKFLOW_STORE( WORKFLOW_UUID, -- 1 WORKFLOW_DEFINITION, -- 2 WORKFLOW_INPUTS, -- 3 WORKFLOW_OPTIONS, -- 4 WORKFLOW_STATE, -- 5 SUBMISSION_TIME -- 6 ) SELECT we.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_UUID, -- 1 wea.WDL_SOURCE, -- 2 wea.JSON_INPUTS, -- 3 wea.WORKFLOW_OPTIONS, -- 4 we.STATUS, -- 5 we.START_DT -- 6 FROM WORKFLOW_EXECUTION we JOIN WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_AUX wea ON we.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID = wea.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID WHERE we.STATUS = 'Running'

changeSet.author: mcovarr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO JOB_STORE( WORKFLOW_UUID, -- 1 CALL_FQN, -- 2 JOB_SCATTER_INDEX, -- 3 JOB_RETRY_ATTEMPT, -- 4 JOB_SUCCESSFUL, -- 5 RETURN_CODE, -- 6 EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, -- 7 RETRYABLE_FAILURE -- 8 ) SELECT we.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_UUID, -- 1 e.CALL_FQN, -- 2 e.IDX, -- 3 e.ATTEMPT, -- 4 1, -- 5 e.RC, -- 6 null, -- 7 null -- 8 FROM EXECUTION e JOIN WORKFLOW_EXECUTION we ON e.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID = we.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID WHERE we.STATUS = 'Running' AND e.STATUS = 'Done' AND e.CALL_FQN NOT LIKE '%$%' AND -- filter out scatters NOT (e.IDX = -1 AND EXISTS ( -- filter out collectors SELECT 1 FROM EXECUTION e2 WHERE e2.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID = e.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID AND e2.CALL_FQN = e.CALL_FQN AND e2.IDX != -1)) AND NOT EXISTS ( -- filter out earlier attempts SELECT 1 FROM EXECUTION e3 WHERE e3.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID = e.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID AND e3.CALL_FQN = e.CALL_FQN AND e3.IDX = e.IDX AND e3.ATTEMPT > e.ATTEMPT)

changeSet.author: mcovarr
changeSet.comment: This changeset is a retroactive insertion into the changeset order to enable migration of null output values in a 0.19 Cromwell installation to the job store simpleton table introduced in pluggable backend Cromwell. Because this is a retroactive insertion, the "tableExists" precondition keeps this changeset from running on a database that has already been migrated to the pluggable backend schema (this migration is unnecessary in a database that has already been migrated to the pluggable backend schema since a later changeset also drops this constraint).

changeSet.author: mcovarr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO BACKEND_KV_STORE( WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_UUID, -- 1 CALL_FQN, -- 2 JOB_SCATTER_INDEX, -- 3 JOB_RETRY_ATTEMPT, -- 4 STORE_KEY, -- 5 STORE_VALUE -- 6 ) SELECT we.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_UUID, -- 1 e.CALL_FQN, -- 2 e.IDX, -- 3 e.ATTEMPT, -- 4 'jobId', -- 5 ei.INFO_VALUE -- 6 FROM EXECUTION_INFO ei JOIN EXECUTION e ON e.EXECUTION_ID = ei.EXECUTION_ID JOIN WORKFLOW_EXECUTION we ON we.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID = e.WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_ID WHERE ei.INFO_KEY = 'JES_RUN_ID' AND ei.INFO_VALUE IS NOT NULL
